issues.title: Insufficient Storage Capacity
issues.description: Current warehouse space is inadequate for the volume of materials requiring storage
issues.description_ar: مساحة المستودع الحالية غير كافية لحجم المواد التي تحتاج للتخزين

issues.title: Security Vulnerabilities
issues.description: Perimeter security and access control measures need improvement
issues.description_ar: أمن المحيط وإجراءات التحكم في الوصول تحتاج تحسين

issues.title: Material Organization
issues.description: Layout optimization needed for better material accessibility
issues.description_ar: تحسين التخطيط مطلوب لتسهيل الوصول للمواد

issues.title: Facility Maintenance
issues.description: Regular maintenance schedule needs to be established

recommendations: Evaluate options for expanding storage capacity
Upgrade perimeter security and access controls
Implement organized layout for better material access
